job description:
Bioinformatics Scientist

Biocept, Inc.
  • San Diego, CA 92121
Contract

Job Description

Tasks and Responsibilities
  • Develop and maintain analysis pipelines for next generation sequencing data in research and diagnostic environments
  • Deep dive analysis of specific sequencing datasets to assess data/experiment quality
  • Develop analysis algorithms for use in creating diagnostic quality data including cutoffs, sensitivity and specificity limits.
  • Monitor data integrity and quality and alert team members when inconsistencies arise
  • Trouble shooting and problem solving code, NGS experiments, and run failure patterns
  • Use data mining tools to develop root cause hypotheses and analysis tools to perform follow-up tests
  • Maintain software coding standards while growing adoption of shared libraries and scripts across the organization
  • Solve complex technology and development challenges
Required Skills&Experience
  • MS/PhD in bioinformatics, mathematics, computer science, biology, chemistry, or similar, with 3-5 years experience in an industrial environment.
  • Strong programming (Python, C++, or Java) or scripting (Perl, R, or Bash) ability, specifically in the analysis of NGS data
  • Strong familiarity with existing pipelines/algorithms for alignment (BWA, Bowtie, etc.) and variant calling (GATK, VarScan, FreeBayes, etc.).
  • Experience building/validating pipelines in a clinical diagnostics environment.
  • Previous experience next generation data interpretation, preferably within the context of diagnostics development environment.
  • Experience with current bioinformatics tools supporting NGS applications (RNASeq, CHiPSeq, genome re-sequencing, and de novo genome assembly).
  • Previous experience with managed code and source control concepts.
  • Results oriented and methodical
  • Must be able to design experiments and perform data analysis for others and have demonstrated experience in achieving results with team members in non-biological disciplines
  • Ability to work collaboratively with people across multiple functional areas.
Job Type: Contract

Job Type: Contract

Experience:
  • Bioinformatics: 5 years (Required)
Education:
  • Master's (Preferred)
Location:
  • San Diego, CA (Required)
Work authorization:
  • United States (Required)
